entry.title: Saturday night: Near blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
